title: muchchaTaina naaDavEmira
sahitya:
muccaTaina nADavEmirA kOdaNDapANi



caraNam 1



 muccaTaina nADavEmi mudamutO mI pAdamula 

maravaka ellappuDu nA madini viDuvaka talatulEna nEnu



caraNam 2



 endAka nE vEDukondu Emi jEsitu I vELayandu 

centa jEritini nannu cEpaTTumu mrokkedanu 



caraNam 3



 nEnokkaDana mIku sunta nApai nenaru lEdu 

mA talli sItammakaina manavi ceppa keDupOtivO



caraNam 4



 pandreNDu yeNDlAyE nEnu bandekhAnalOnE yuNTi  

nallula dOmala cEta nalugu cunnadi dEhamu



caraNam 5



 caitra vaishAkamulipuDu ceppataramu gAdu entO 

tahashIlu sEyaga nAku jAmInaina evvarulEru



caraNam 6



 tAniSAgAru vocci tahashIl jEstunnAru 

kAsulu pampinci nannu karuNa cEra viDipincu 



caraNam 7



 oNTarigA nEnuNTE niNTidaggara evvarulEru 

jaNTAtO sItA lakSmaNulu veNTanE kUDi mIrocci



caraNam 8



 vEmAru shrI bhadrAcala rAmasvAmi mIrippuDu 

rAmadAsuni cEpaTTi rakSimpakunnAvu taNDri
